ComicInfo.Summary: Gonzo zombie killing action await in the new horror series DOA INC. LLC! Prepare for an adventure set in the wicked world of G.O. Parsons, the writer behind 'Willy's Wonderland' and 'Beast of Bower Boulevard.' Teaming up with visionary artist Emanuele Tommarelli, this dynamic duo delivers a spine-tingling twist on the classic tale of terror. In a realm where every conceivable evil prowls unchecked, justice is a rare commodity. Enter DOA INC. LLC, a ragtag company of mercenaries ready to exact revenge and eliminate any undead entity causing trouble... for the right price.
ComicInfo.ScanInformation: Extracted at 450 DPI. Support indie publishers you like, grab them beautiful trade collections for your shelves after checkin' the books out here!
